name: Top Stories
description: The most important and trending news headlines from all sectors.

name: Breaking News
description: Urgent and live updates on unfolding events as they happen.

name: National
description: News and developments from within the country.

name: International
description: Global affairs, foreign policy, and news from around the world.

description: National and international political developments, elections, and government policies.

description: Financial markets, economy, corporate news, and entrepreneurship.

description: Updates on tech innovations, gadgets, software, startups, and digital trends.

description: News, scores, and updates from various sports disciplines.

description: News from film, music, television, art, and celebrity culture.

description: Arts, literature, traditions, and societal trends.

name: Opinion
description: Editorials, columns, and analyses from experts and commentators.

description: In-depth articles providing context and background to complex topics.
